snippet: “Stories the City Tells Itself” is a tender, moving and sad but also deeply funny collection of work by the artist Neil Goldberg.
abstract: Randy Kennedy reviews Stories the City Tells Itself, exhibit of video and photographs by artist Neil Goldberg, at the Museum of the City of New York.
lead_paragraph: “Stories the City Tells Itself” is a tender, moving and sad but also deeply funny collection of work by the artist Neil Goldberg.

headline.seo: Neil Goldberg Exhibition at Museum of the City of New York
headline.main: The Extraordinary, Glimpsed in the Ordinary
